index.name: grails
index.subtitle: Grails
index.about: Grails is an Open Source, full stack, web application framework for the JVM. It takes advantage of the Groovy programming language and convention over configuration to provide a productive and stream-lined development experience.

videos.title: Grails dependencies with Artifactory
videos.description: Artifactory is a popular Grails dependency manager, in this video you will watch how to use and what is your benefits.
